mapper.select: SELECT book.*, member.title memberTitle, time_table.hour hour FROM (SELECT shop.*, time_table.time_id, time_table.hour FROM shop, time_table WHERE shop.member_id='kopo' AND time_table.member_id='kopo') book JOIN member ON book.member_id=member.id JOIN time_table ON book.time_id=time_table.time_id ORDER BY time_table.hour, book.table_id
